document.full_text: when the sierra club's nationwide campaign to raise awareness of the dangers of mercury arrived on friday, just in time for earth day, more than two dozen residents showed up to have their hair tested.
document.title: some mark earth day with mercury testing "snip-ins"
lines_and_colors: when the sierra club's nationwide campaign to raise awareness of the dangers of mercury arrived on friday, just in time for earth day, more than two dozen residents showed up to have their hair tested.
